parameters.name: ampl2d
parameters.description: IONOGRAM: expandable thumbnails of color-coded relative amplitude (0-255) on ionogram time (x) vs. apparent range from satellite down (y) grid

parameters.name: ampl
parameters.description: IONOGRAM: continuous-film display of color-coded relative amplitude (0-255) on ionogram time (x) vs. apparent range from satellite down (y) grid

parameters.name: freq
parameters.description: -- Sounder frequency in MHz (incl. fixed and swept frequency parts) - ONLY positively identified frequencies are shown

parameters.name: swept_start
parameters.description: -- Scan line number of start of swept portion (before is fixed portion)

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: ORBIT PARAMETERS: Satellite altitude in km

parameters.name: DIP
parameters.description: -- Magnetic inclination (Dip angle of magnetic field direction) in degrees

parameters.name: LMT
parameters.description: -- Local Mean Time (LMT) in decimal hours

parameters.name: GMLMT
parameters.description: -- Geomagnetic Local Time in decimal hours

parameters.name: pps_code
parameters.description: -- Pulses per second code: 0 = 30 pps, 1 = 60 pps

parameters.name: DMODE
parameters.description: -- DMODE (transmitter on/off for alternate frame pairs): 0 = off, 1 = on

parameters.name: GMODE
parameters.description: -- GMODE (transmission of alternate frames of swept and fixed frequency): 0 = off, 1 = on

parameters.name: SourceFlag
parameters.description: Data source flag =1 if based on 320ms data, = 2 if based  on old V2 15.36s data

parameters.name: N_of_points
parameters.description: Number of points in 15.36 second average. Max. number is 48(12) for data source flag equal 1(2)

parameters.name: B_jj_Variances
parameters.description: Variances; diagonal elements Bxx, Byy, Bzz; GSE coordinates

parameters.name: B_jk_Variances
parameters.description: Variances; off-diagonal elements Byx, Bzx, Bzy; GSE coordinates

parameters.name: TimeShift
parameters.description: Difference between record time tag and start of average,Relevant to data source flag = 2 records only.

parameters.name: SW_flag
parameters.description: Solar wind flag =0 if IMP in solar wind =1 otherwise

parameters.name: Proton_DIntn
parameters.description: (Spectrogram-Full List) Proton Diff Intens (no bckgrd subtract), 30 energies 0.5-500 MeV, spin-avg

parameters.name: Proton_DIntn2
parameters.description: (Stacked time-series) Proton Diff Intens (no bckgrd subtract), 8 energies 0.5-20 MeV, spin-avg

parameters.name: Proton_DIntn3
parameters.description: (Stacked time-series) Proton Diff Intens (no bckgrd subtract), 8 energies 20-500 MeV, spin-avg

parameters.name: Proton_DIntn4
parameters.description: (Individual time-series) Proton Diff Intens (no bckgrd subtract), spin-avg

parameters.name: Proton_DIntn4_errorbars
parameters.description: (Individual time-series) Proton Diff Intens (no bckgrd subtract), spin-avg, with error bars

parameters.name: C_Rate
parameters.description: GME/LED C Singles Rate (C<200 ct/sec implies enhanced/variable background <20 MeV/nuc)

parameters.name: Alpha_DIntn
parameters.description: (Spectrogram-Full List) Alpha Diff Intens (no bckgrd subtract), 21 energies 1-80 MeV/nuc, spin-avg

parameters.name: Alpha_DIntn2
parameters.description: (Stacked time-series) Alpha Diff Intens (no bckgrd subtract), 7 energies 1-20 MeV/nuc, spin-avg

parameters.name: Alpha_DIntn3
parameters.description: (Stacked time-series) Alpha Diff Intens (no bckgrd subtract), 4 energies 20-80 MeV/nuc, spin-avg

parameters.name: Alpha_DIntn4
parameters.description: (Individual time-series) Alpha Diff Intens (no bckgrd subtract), spin-avg

parameters.name: Alpha_DIntn4_errorbars
parameters.description: (Individual time-series) Alpha Diff Intens (no bckgrd subtract), spin-avg, with error bars

parameters.name: Elec_Intn
parameters.description: Electron Intensity, 0.3-18 MeV (no bckgrd subtract), spin-avg

parameters.name: Elec_Intn_errorbars
parameters.description: Electron Intensity, 0.3-18 MeV (no bckgrd subtract), spin-avg, with error bars

parameters.name: Elec_BackIntn_errorbars
parameters.description: Electron Background Intensity, 0.3-18 MeV, spin-avg, with error bars

parameters.name: Event_Rates_errorbars
parameters.description: 11 I8 GME Event Type Rates with error bars

parameters.name: Singles_Rates_errorbars
parameters.description: 7 GME Singles Type Rates with error bars

parameters.name: Region
parameters.description: Region flag (1=Solar Wind, 2= Solar Wind or Magnetosheath, 3= Not Solar Wind)

parameters.name: xyzgse_t
parameters.description: IMP8 Position, Cartesian-GSE - time series plots X/Y/Z

parameters.description: (Fits-based, no region selected) Proton Flow Speed

parameters.description: --> (Fits-based, solar wind only) Proton Flow Speed

parameters.name: proton_density_mom_rfilt

parameters.name: EW_flowangle_best
parameters.description: (Fits-based, no region selected) Proton East/West flow angle (aberration corrected)

parameters.name: EW_flowangle_best_rfilt
parameters.description: --> (Fits-based, solar wind only) Proton East/West flow angle (aberration corrected)

parameters.name: EW_flowangle_mom
parameters.description: --> (Moments-based, no region selected) Proton East/West flow angle (no aberration correction)

parameters.name: EW_flowangle_mom_rfilt
parameters.description: --> (Moments-based, solar wind only) Proton East/West flow angle (no aberration correction)

parameters.description: Magnetic Field average of magnitudes,  scalar
